programme.title: Tariq El Ward
programme.desc: The series revolves around a young village woman who is fond of roses. When she faces a major problem that puts her in the center of family conflicts, she is forced to flee her village for the city in search of a better future, but her journey will be full of problems and difficulties.

programme.title: Bghit Hyatek
programme.desc: Three families have their lives turned upside down when they allow strangers to enter their world and destroy it.

programme.title: L'Maktoub
programme.desc: As a family seeks to keep its inheritance, its members decide to marry off Omar Al-Maatawi to his brother's wife after his death in order to achieve that end, but Omar's heart is attached to the girl Hind, who looks very similar to his deceased wife.

programme.title: My Home My Destiny
programme.desc: Zeynep is a young law student who finds herself torn between her two mothers. She has been trying for years to equalize the two parties and is appreciative of her mother's genuine sacrifices, but she also works hard to fulfill her mother's other ambitions.

programme.title: Kadin
programme.desc: Bahar meets Sarp on a ship , they fall in love and get married. Bahar gives birth to a girl named Nisan and a young boy, Doruk, but her life turns upside down when her husband disappears from their lives and she's forced to face life with her two children alone.

programme.title: El Fed TV 3
programme.desc: The sitcom presents a number of satirical segments that address, through various figures in Moroccan society, many social issues, in an attempt to present them in an interesting comedic way.

programme.title: Jib Darkoum
programme.desc: It follows the dentist Mohsen, who falls in love with a girl from a rich family, and since he is an orphan, he lies to her and introduces her to a fake family who proposes to her family. Hilarity ensues when he is forced to live with the lie during the dating period that will last a month under one roof.

programme.title: 2 Wjouh
programme.desc: The series takes place in the city of Casablanca and tells the story of one of the slums in which begging and poverty are widespread, through stories from the class that suffers in Moroccan society.

programme.title: ‏Bnat Lahdid‏
programme.desc: Fatima is a young woman from a poor environment, who is distinguished by her strength and determination in overcoming life's difficulties. She works in her father's profession of selling used car supplies, until she meets a rich man and tries to get closer to him and his family. However, Fatima gets into serious problems and conflicts afterwards.

programme.desc: In the town of Tal Al-Sabr, near the city of Nablus, Palestinian prisoner Bilal survives after escaping from the occupier, as his aunt Umm Askar saves him from a certain death. Bilal changes his name to Assif and the events go on.

programme.title: Al Washm
programme.desc: The series takes place in an old Levantine neighborhood, where it showcases the intertwined human relationships of the neighborhood’s residents, and the overt and hidden conflicts that take place between them.

programme.title: Aghmed Aynayk
programme.desc: Zaid is a special needs child. Doctors diagnose his condition with being on the autism spectrum, so Mu’nis, his mother’s friend, takes care of him as he is affected by his psychological state, and tries to provide him with a stable and normal life.

programme.title: Al Sadeeqat
programme.desc: A businesswoman seeks to exploit some girls to achieve her personal interests by having them work as dancers and forcing them to do whatever she asks, whatever it is, and the stories of these women come across each other.

programme.title: Bayt Ahly
programme.desc: The events take place in the 1940s, after Nouri leaves prison, a major conflict arises between him and Abu Adnan, coinciding with the assassination of the doctor, Abdul Rahman Al Shahbandar.

programme.title: Mal El Qabban
programme.desc: The events of the series take place inside Al-Hal Market in Damascus, highlighting the conditions of the Syrians, through the story of the Noman Al Zeer family and the events and problems they are exposed to.

programme.title: Al Arabji 2
programme.desc: Events escalate in the second season of the series, and Abdou the coachman seeks revenge and retaliation against his enemies, especially Al Nashwati, who allied this time with Doria. On the other hand, Zumuruda, who fleed from cruelty and oppression, does not know which path her fate will take her.

programme.title: Kasr Adm 2: Al Saradib
programme.desc: In the second season, Abu Rayyan returns with many secrets and cases, at the same time, Brigadier General Kanaan Al Sayegh is responsible for uncovering corruption cases and confronting their perpetrators.

programme.title: Arees Taht Al Talab
programme.desc: The events revolve around a group of people searching for love and marriage, and going through different circumstances. Dana creates an association for dating and reconciliation of loved ones, and the events continue.

programme.title: Al Khataya
programme.desc: Through six groups of five episodes, the work tells six stories about people who make mistakes and continue to make mistakes, but they lead them towards the abyss, and they drag other people with them.

programme.title: Al Washm

programme.desc: Rhaglen i blant lle da ni'n ymweld a gwledydd y byd i ddysgu am yr hanes, bryd, tirwedd, plant a'r diwylliant yno. Y tro hwn: trip i Kenya. This time: a trip to Kenya.

programme.title: Octonots

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Mae Bobl o hyd yn chwarae'r 'gêm gopïo' tan i Ffobl ymddangos a'i gopïo fe, felly mae'r Olobobs yn creu Tobl sydd wrth ei fodd yn cael ei gopïo! Bobble won't stop playing the 'copying game'!

programme.title: New: Ne-wff-ion
programme.desc: Ceiniog a Niwc - dau air, ond un ystyr. Lwsi sy'n edrych ar yr amrywiaeth o eiriau ni'n defnyddio mewn gwahanol ardaloedd. Lwsi looks at the variety of words we use in different areas.

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi

programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Y Dderwen sy'n ymuno â Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Y Dderwen join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: Halibalw

programme.desc: Mae Crawc yn falch iawn o'i hamog newydd ond yn gwrthod gadael i'w ffrindiau gael tro ynddo. Toad shows off his new hammock but refuses to let anyone else have a nap in it.

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Heddiw cawn gwrdd â Deiniol y cocatw, ac Ifan a'i gi. Today we meet Deiniol the cockatoo, and Ifan and his dog.

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae Coch a Melyn yn cwrdd ag Oren. Dysga beth sy'n digwydd pan ti'n cymysgu Coch a Melyn. Red and Yellow meet new arrival Orange. Discover what happens when you mix red and yellow.

programme.title: Jen a Jim Pob Dim
programme.desc: Mae 'na sêr gwib di-rif yn gwibio heibio'r roced ac mae Jangl yn ceisio eu cyfri ond yn ei gweld yn amhosib. Jangl is trying to count shooting stars. There must be an easier way!

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae Siôn yn perswadio Mario i roi cynnig ar fersiwn iachus o un o'i hoff fwydydd. Siôn persuades Mario to try a healthy version of his favourite dish.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Heddiw, ry' ni'n ymweld â gwlad sy'n llawn anialwch a phethau hanesyddol - Yr Aifft. Yma, byddwn yn dysgu am yr Eifftiaid Hynafol, pyramidiau Giza, a chrefydd. We take a trip to Egypt.

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Rhaid i'r Octonots rwystro dau ferdysyn mantis rhag ymladd cyn i'w crafangau cryfion chwalu'r Octofad. The Octonauts must stop two mantis shrimps fighting before they destroy the Octopad.

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Taith llong o Gaernarfon i Abersoch a geir tro yma. Mae hi'n llong anarferol iawn, gan mai hwyaden yw ei chapten! A traditional Welsh song about a ship's journey from Caernarfon to Abersoch.

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Mae creigiau enfawr yn ymddangos o gwmpas y goedwig! Giant rocks appear all over the forest!

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion
programme.desc: Heddiw, mae Lwsi'n ymweld â theulu sy'n addysgu eu plant gartre' a'r gwersi yn cynnwys dysgu am wenyn a mêl, a gwneud cloc haul. Today Lwsi visits a family that teach their children at home.

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Pan fydd mellt yn taro, mae'r dreigiau angen cario negeseuon yn ôl a 'mlaen ar y rheilffordd. When lightning strikes, it's up to the dragons to carry coded messages on the railway.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Glan Morfa sy'n ymuno â Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Glan Morfa join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Codi Hwyl - UDA
programme.desc: Mae'r ddau yn anelu am yr Unol Daleithiau! The pair head for the United States! [SL]

programme.title: Heno
programme.desc: Bydd Trystan a Emma yn trafod cyfres newydd o Priodas Pum Mil a byddwn yn nodi Diwrnod Aren y Byd gyda Huw Fash. We discuss a new series of Priodas Pum Mil and celebrate World Kidney Day.

programme.title: Pobol y Chwarel
programme.desc: Cyfres sy'n clustfeinio ar fywydau cymeriadau yng nghymuned chwarelyddol glos Bethesda. Series looking at the lives of some of the characters living in Bethesda's quarry community.

programme.title: Y Fets
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, mae angen ychydig o waith deintydda ar Oreo y gwningen ac mae Hannah yn brwydro i achub Cymro y ci defaid. This time: what will the future hold for Mavis' Westie pups?

programme.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn gydag eitemau coginio a ffasiwn a chyngor am bopeth o addurno'ch cartref i ddewis llyfr da. Magazine series including features on fashion, style, antiques and cookery.

programme.desc: Stori Lily Tobias o Ystalyfera, awdur ac ymgyrchydd oedd yn dyheu am diriogaeth i'w chenedl yr Iddewon. Lily Tobias - author and campaigner for peace who dreamed of a land for the Jews.

programme.title: Timpo
programme.desc: Mae Siani Po y Post yn chwilio am ffordd gynt i ddosbarthu'r llythyrau! Siani the Postal Delivery Po needs a quicker way to get around her delivery round!

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Pa anifail wnawn ni gwrdd â heddiw tybed? Which animal will we meet today at Gwesty Sigldigwt?

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae 'Rhen Gerwyn yn mwynhau sôn am ei anturiaethau ar y môr ac yn codi ofn ar Twt wrth sôn am fwystfilod môr. Twt doesn't believe in sea monsters but will he change his mind?

programme.title: Twt Bwystfil y Môr - Season 1, Episode 1

programme.desc: Heddiw ar Newffion Alaw gydag adroddiad ar agoriad swyddogol gardd synhwyrau Ysgol Llanilar. Today on Newffion Alaw reports on the official opening of Ysgol Llanilar's sensory garden.

programme.title: Cath-Od
programme.desc: Mae'n ddiwrnod weddol dawel nes bod Macs a Crinc yn disgyn i mewn i'r bin sbwriel ac yn mynd yn sownd wrth ei gilydd. New animation series. Macs and Crinc fall into a rubbish bin.

programme.title: Bwystfil
programme.desc: Dyma i chi ddeg bwystfil sy'n gweithio'n grêt fel grwp. There are lots of advantages to living in a group. Today we meet 10 beasts who work well as a group.

programme.title: Larfa
programme.desc: Mae 'na hwyl a sbri gydag ymbarel y tro hwn! There's fun to be had with an umbrella this time!

programme.title: Y Goleudy
programme.desc: Mae Alex, sydd bellach yn ffrindiau gyda Bleddyn ar ôl eu profiad gyda'r Goleudy, yn gwahodd fe a'r gweddill i barti haf. Efa is unsure of her feelings towards Bleddyn and jealous of Alex.

programme.title: New: Newyddion Ni
programme.desc: Newyddion i bobl ifanc. News programme for youngsters.

programme.title: New: Cynefin Byr
programme.desc: Cawn gwmni Tom Henderson, sy'n arwain tim o wirfoddolwyr i adfer hen waith copr yr Hafod, Abertawe. We meet Tom Henderson who leads a team restoring the old Hendre Copper Works, Swansea.

programme.title: Parti Bwyd Beca

programme.title: Jambori
programme.desc: Dewch gyda Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth a lluniau lliwgar - bydd cysgodion yn dawnsio a robotiaid yn chwarae. Join Jam on an interesting and colourful musical adventure!

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae gan Pablo ei ffordd ei hun o weld y byd, ond heddiw mae swn ar y stryd yn ei ddychryn. Sut greadur ydi'r ddraig swnllyd? Pablo is afraid of noise, but his friends help him.

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Mae gan bawb le arbennig i gysgu heblaw am Nensyn, felly mae'r Cymylaubychain yn mynd ati i drefnu syrpreis arbennig iddo. Nensyn gets a nice surprise from his friends.

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Meleri yn ymweld á gardd Ysgol Pendalar, bydd Evan ac Idris yn mynd ar daith ystlumod yn y nos, a bydd Huw yn nofio yn y mor gyda Jac. More adventures in the open air.

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Ma chwarae'n troi'n chwerw wrth I Deian a Loli dorri drych a dysgu bod 7 mlynedd o anlwc o'u blaena'! Will a four-leafed clover, Magpie and Sera'r Clêr Blêr prevent 7 years of bad luck?!

programme.title: Blero'n Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd yn myd Blero heddiw tybed? What's happening in the world of Blero today?

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Dewch ar antur gyda ni i gwrdd ag anifeiliaid bach y byd. Y tro hwn down i nabod y Piranha, y Melfroch a'r Bolgi. This time we learn about the Pirahna, the Honey badger and the Wolverine.

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae brecwast arbennig ar fwydlen y bwyty heddiw, ond yn anffodus, mae ieir Magi wedi diflannu a hebddyn nhw does dim wyau. Siôn is trying a new breakfast menu today, but there are no eggs!

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci nôl gyda sgetsys dwl a doniol! Cacamwnci is back, with Iestyn Ymestyn,Tesni Trwsio Pobeth, Dani Rheolaeth, Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa and Delyth Dylwythen.

programme.title: New: Stwnsh Sadwrn Byw

programme.desc: Mae gofid am gyflwr Bandit y fferet, a Hannah a Dafydd sy'n gwneud llawdriniaeth frys ar lo. The father and son vets, Harry and Hywel, are vaccinating donkeys and testing a herd for TB. [SL]

programme.title: Am Dro
programme.desc: Andy, Carys, Sian a Gwilym sy'n mynd am dro i Fodffordd a Llangefni, Caernarfon a'r Foryd, Llandaf a Chaerdydd, a Charreg Cennen. We walk around Llangefni, Caernarfon, Cardiff, & a castle. [SL]
